label: Maruyama, Munetoshi & Hiromu Kamezawa.  2013. Adinopsis nippon, a new species of marsh-dwelling rove beetle (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae: Deinopsini) from Japan, with an annotated catalogue of Adinopsis species of the world. Zootaxa 3669(1): 76-84.
